Posts.Content: PinkSurvivor wrote: I am 33 years old dx with Stage II IDC her2+, I am scheduled on 8-31-10 to have a sentinal node biopsy and am scared, the dr said I would be off work for 2 weeks.  Can anyone share there experience with me, what to expect, how painful is it, will I really be off work for 2 weeks. Then I will start chemo shortly after. Scared!!!!  Please help. Tina Dx 7/19/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 0/5 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
